body.name: Stove Knob Lock for Baby Safety (6 Pack), Stove Stoppaz Child Proofing Stove Lock (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 17 mins
features: Easy Installation: These Stove locks are designed for effortless installation, eliminating the need to unscrew knob covers. You can simply slide the lock behind the knob to secure it, making it a hassle-free solution for parents.

Heat-Resistant and Durable: The locks are made from heat-resistant plastic, ensuring they can withstand the high temperatures generated by stoves without compromising safety. They are also built to last with textured bumps for better grip, and they seamlessly blend in with your appliance's appearance.
No Drill Installation: Stove Stoppaz's childproof stove knob locks don't require any drilling or complex installation, making them user-friendly and suitable for various kitchen setups.

Application Range: It's crucial to measure the stove knob gap before purchasing these locks to ensure they fit. The recommended clearance below the gas stove knob ranges from 0.08 inches to 0.46 inches, offering versatility to accommodate different stove models.

Customer Support: Stove Stoppaz seems to prioritize customer satisfaction. They appear willing to assist with any questions or concerns you may have about their product. Additionally, each package includes six baby-proof stove locks, and they offer a 1-year warranty for added peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The burners do not turn on when these are in place

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars work great on my Samsung, not so much my z-line range
reviews.reviewText: they work great on my old Samsung range, may have popped a couple of the knobs off here and there but that may have been partially due to not being placed correctly prior to installing the safety clips. may new z line range can not use these as they have a "ring" around the handle that does not allow for the clip to slip in behind the knob. so guess I can only use them in the guest house with my old range. but at least they work, they're easy to use and do the job, overall not a bad product so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install and easy piece of mind
reviews.reviewText: These locks went on easy and make me feel so much better with my toddler wandering around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Kept making my knobs pop off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wish they would make ones bigger for commercial stoves. They just barely fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and work well enough
reviews.reviewText: I honestly could've used these when doing our kitchen renovation (in addition to having babies in the house). Our stove knobs are easy to turn just by bumping into them, and these certainly prevent that (to a decent extent). They are easy to install and are aesthetically subtle. Now that a baby is running around, I feel a bit more relaxed that the knobs are not easily turned. These aren't 100% perfect, but I am satisfied and happy with the 6 pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential for a house with a toddler.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Stove Knob Lock for Baby Safety because I have a curious toddler who likes to play with the knobs.It was easy to install and it fits snugly on my stove. The only downside is that it is a bit hard to remove and insert when I want to use the stove, but I guess that's part of the safety feature. It is sleek and easy to store when not in use.It comes in a pack of 6, im only using 4, but you can have some extra or if you have more then 4 knobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Measure before purchase
reviews.reviewText: This prevents the knobs on my stove from being pushed in to then be able to turn on.My husband and I occasionally push into the knobs and depending on what we had on, and would turn the knobs. I did measure my stove before getting these as it is suggested.Stove knobs have different push-down wedge requirements and you can push too hard and pop off your stove knob. Lesson learned, but no damage just put the knob back on the stove and know not to push that hard. The lock part goes on quickly.The instructions are very microscopic. Seeing that this product is to help keep others reasonably safe from your stove. I watched a video and picture read. I seriously needed a magnifying glass to read these instructions.And these stove locks work. They perform their job.
